name: Smoothie Ice Maker – Cooking Chef 4 Girls & Teens
name_original: Smoothie Ice Maker – Cooking Chef 4 Girls & Teens
description:
You like cold drinks like beers, colas and sodas. It’s time to make some delicious organic yummy fresh fruits shake Smoothies with this free girls, kids and teens chef game. Make and dress up your yummy, mouthwatering, delicious strawberry + banana, apricot + apple smoothie or orange + pomegranate & many more healthy cold beverages with smoothie maker, a free fun game. Get a horse power blender of at least 800 watt like vitamix 5200, Blendtech or Beeville Hemisphere (some cool and powerful blenders in the market) and become the smoothly king in your neighborhood. Do a super workout in the gymnasium and then drink a full jug of a tasty healthy fresh fruit smoothie and you would sure to have a feeling that can’t be described in words! You would feel that you are dancing in the heavens~ voila!

Have you ever tasted these healthy organic Smoothies e.g. chocolate + coconut milk & banana, pineapple + soda milk & vanilla or cherry & pear? If not try these and you would surely like them, they are delicious.

You can boost your brain, build muscle, burn fat, and help your heart in less than one minute: Just mix up a smoothie and slurp. It's that simple. These healthy organic homemade Smoothies are sure to taste great and fill you up for hours. Also don’t forget to eat some delicious ice cream cupcakes, brownies, Jell-O, candies, pancakes, Fudge or some fresh juicy fruits as a sweet dessert or as an alternative to Smoothies sometime.

Features:
• Easy tap and drag game play.
• Make and decorate your Smoothies as mouthwatering and yummy with delicious toppings
• Choose the glasses, wallpapers & side orders of your liking to make the whole effect cool and beautiful.
• Drink, save or set your yummy Smoothie as wallpaper on your phone.
• Smoothie maker is a fun and simple game
• Kids friendly content e.g. No violence, horror or nudity
• Suitable for the whole family
• Cool BG music and HD graphics
